nodes.text: The Ziugen system was a star system located within the Hutt Space portion of the Slice. The system lay on the hyperlane called the Shag Pabol that connected it to the world of Ylesia and the Outland Transit Station. A smaller hyperspace route also linked the system to the planet of Poytta. The Ziugen system contained the slave colony world of the same name.
The Ziugen system was first mentioned in The Essential Atlas, a 2009 reference book co-authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed it within grid square T-12.
